Interface Purchasable

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdamSmith, AugustoPinochet, AugustusCaesar, Axe, BaseballBat, BernardMontgomery, Chainsaw, Champion, CharlesDarwin, Confucius, Dagger, DavidLange, DouglasMacArthur, DwightEisenhower, ElvisPresley, Fists, FranzFerdinand, FryingPan, GeorgeWashington, GhengisKhan, GolfClub, HarryTruman, JoeRogan, JohnBrowning, JohnDoe, JohnFKennedy, JohnMaynardKeynes, JosefStalin, Katana, KingGeorge, Mace, Machete, MarcusAurelius, MargaretThatcher, MarieCurie, MatthiasGalster, MiguelMorales, MikolosHorthy, NapoleonBonaparte, NeilArmstrong, NikitaKrustchev, Nunchucks, PhilGarland, PhilippePetain, Pickaxe, Pitchfork, QueenVictoria, RobertMuldoon, RudyardKipling, Scythe, Shield, ShokoAsahara, Shovel, Shuriken, SimonHoermann, Sledgehammer, Spear, StephenHawking, SunTzu, Sword, TedKaczynski, TennisRacket, TimBell, Weapon, WilliamShakespeare
public interface Purchasable
Interface for objects that can be purchased in the shop. This interface ensure the classes implementing it contains all the necessary functionality to interact with the shop in order to be bought and sold.

  • Method Details

    • getName

      String getName()
      Get the name of the purchasable object.
      Returns:
      The name of the object

    • getPrice

      float getPrice()
      Get the price of the purchasable object.
      Returns:
      The price of the object

    • getImage

      ImageIcon getImage()
      Get the image of the purchasable object.
      Returns:
      The image of the object

    • buy

      void buy(Team team) throws InsufficientFundsException, FullTeamException, IllegalPurchaseException
      Method to buy the purchasable for the given team.
      Parameters:
      team - the team that wants to buy the purchasable
      Throws:
      InsufficientFundsException - if the team cannot afford this purchasable
      FullTeamException - if the team already has a full inventory of this purchasable type
      IllegalPurchaseException - if the purchase should not be allowed for the team

    • sell

      void sell(Team team)
      Method to sell the purchasable in the given team.
      Parameters:
      team - the team that contains the purchasable to be sold
